channel.title: Torvapkz help me please
channel.description: hey i downloaded the source and client. But im unsure how to use turmoil prayers??? How do i change pray book? if possible it says 100% working turmoil prays but yeah... can someone help me?

item.title: Torvapkz help me please
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

Torva-PKz\src\server\world\ObjectManager.java

Look for; public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) {

Under that add; c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(411, 3090, 3498, 1, 10); // Curse Prayers

Then teleport to Edgeville and prayer on the red alter and it will change your prayer to curses.

Read full topic
